    Liroy Lourenco

    • I am most broadly described as a communications engineer.

    I work in the Signal Processing Technologies group at CSIRO's Astronomy & Space Science and am completing a PhD at the University of Sydney. My research is in radio frequency interference mitigation using Phased Array Feeds on the Australian SKA Pathfinder and Parkes telescopes.

    I have a background in Network Engineering, Digital Music Technology and as an educator. I currently tutor Astronomy and Humanitarian Engineering at the University of Sydney and the University of Technology Sydney respectively.
